title: Teen moves in, shoots self in foot with Dad’s gun
content:
A 16-year-old Trotwood teen shot himself in the foot with his father’s gun he found under the bed.
The boy told police while he was being treated that he’d just moved in with his father for the summer. His dad was at work, he explained, and he was snooping around his dad’s room.
According to the police report, the teen found a bag under the bed with a .38 pistol inside. While “playing with it,” the gun went off and shot him in the top of his foot. The bullet exited his ankle.
The father told police he didn’t think his son would have done that.
A social worker at Children’s Medical Center gave the dad a locked box to keep his gun in.
